original_title: DaVita ransomware attack exposes 916,000 patient records and data | Fox News
article_summary:
"DaVita Suffers Ransomware Attack Exposing Personal and Medical Data of Nearly 916,000 People"

"Kidney dialysis giant DaVita has suffered a ransomware attack, exposing sensitive personal and medical data of nearly 916,000 people. The breach, which occurred in April 2025, compromised names, Social Security numbers, medical records, and more. Interlock, a ransomware gang, has claimed responsibility for the attack."</s>
